content_type: Web pages related to Social Security Administration (SSA) disability information. The pages cover topics such as eligibility, medical guidelines (Blue Book), and professional resources.

url.description: The URL of the web page

title.description: The title of the web page

headings.description: An array of headings found on the page.

text.description: The text content of the heading

has_table.description: Indicates if the page contains at least one table.

content_sample.description: A sample of the page's content (first 500 characters)

notes: The schema captures the URL, title, headings, table presence, and content sample. Indexes are suggested for URL (primary key, unique), title (search), headings.text (content search), and content_sample (content search). The `has_table` field is a boolean to indicate table presence which could be useful for filtering or analysis. The heading levels range from 1-6 according to HTML standards.
